Articles.Content: Well, I\'ve been in a tutorial video mood lately and have a really good new screen recorder. Is there anything anyone wants to see done or needs help with? I\'ll use just stock parts for your convenience.

I think the most useful tutorial for new pilots would be something that shows all the stock parts, what they do and basic rocket construction, we get a lot of pepole asking about landing legs or using multiple ASAS for example.

A VAB and ship building tutorial if you will.
OK. I will when I get back tonight.
